Reviews.Title: SMASUNG MV800
Reviews.Author: david c taschner
Reviews.Content: I recieved the camera from beach camera.  I am very happy with the camera and the other items that came with the kit.  The camera was very simple to figure out without even looking at the instructions.  I found the pictures to be very clear and the focus to be exact.  I think the picture quality is outstanding.  The camera is very light and easy to manipulate.  the self portrait option is very nice for getting a group shot with friends and not call someone else to take the shot.  I recommend this camera very hardily to anyone that wants a good camera that is easy to use, and takes outstanding pictures.

Reviews.Title: Review of Samsung MV800
Reviews.Author: stemar
Reviews.Content: Initial opinion after 1 month's usage is:1. Excellent camera2. Quality of photos is fantastic3. HD video a big plus4. Very versatile but easy to use as a lot of thought has gone into "pre-packing" usage templates and programs5. No issue yet with any aspect of camera & would recommend to a friend

Reviews.Title: I'm sure it's a nice camera... If it works.
Reviews.Author: david h.
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get my camera and play with the plethora of functions and filters this super compact holds. there is definitely no shortage of things to learn with this camera. It is very lightweight and feels thin like if you drop it--that's gonna be it, it's over after that. Both the front and back LCD screens come in crystal clear with good color. I just wish it was touch screen rather than have to play with the tiny control pad and microscopic buttons it offers. I got to about picture #20 when the zoom/lens got stuck halfway out and open and wouldn't retract or fully extend. It was jammed!!  I was lucky I had registered it online first thing because samsung makes it no easy task to make the exception of repairing it. And while troubleshooting a remedy I was disappointed to find several other "expected" symptoms and issues with this camera .  Hopefully this will be the only problem this camera brings. As for the extras this bundle comes with I'm really not impressed. The camera case is oversized, generic, and very cheap material that is very ugly and almost embarrassing to put my camera in and take it in public. The tripod might as well be made of flexy staws because it can barely handle the 3.6oz camera without tipping or moving. Highly unstable. I haven't even opened the lens cleaning kit so I cannot comment on that. But the camera's wide variety of functions and ease of use still makes it worth it to me to hang on to. It's very user friendly and is definitely a "smart"camera. Being that the camera has been in repair longer than it has been in my possession I give it 3*.

Reviews.Title: the little camera that could?
Reviews.Author: Emmett
Reviews.Content: Wow outstanding little camera for the price now. I'm a contractor stationed oversea and I love all the special effects this camera brings to the table. It's like having you own little photo-mart. Plus having the ability to take photo of myself. It small, lightweight and structured nicely. I took some photos of my co-worker and they where amazed. One friend is even buying his wife one.. Plus if you really need to see demo go on to YOUTUBE and you will be please with all the option this camera has. Only one small problem you have to go on line and download the full operating manual..other than that Great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Girly camera
Reviews.Author: yyy
Reviews.Content: Really pretty and cute. The package has all the essentials too. Bit pricey but guess thats what u pay for design.I was happy to see that they added additional battery in it (the picture didn't have that so I was pleasantly surprised)The only bad thing is that the delievery took 11days. Yes, nearly 2 weeks. So considering the time value of the money, I had to take that 1 star off. Will update once I start actually using the camera.-------update------okay, here is the update since i've played with it a little more.there were several functions that i really liked. Like there is one mode which allows u to take picture of yourself. this was made really convenient cuz when u flip it open, u can kinda put it on like a desk or something n it will stay upright. Then all u gotta do is tap the screen, it will give 1,2,3 seconds with beep sounds take the photo. so ur hands r all free! The most amazing function was correcting ur skin blemishes. U can either use the beauty mode, or after taking the picture, go to the edit mode and correct it. Its so simple n as long as u took the photo enabling the camera to detect that its a human face, u can edit ur skin to be nearly flawless, even tone.so far love it. oh btw, i had been researching this camera on Korean websites for reviews (u guys all know samsung is korean brand right? :D) n there has been some complaints about photo quality not being awesome compared to other products like canon's. N i agree. If u really want the best quality, i think canon might b better choice. But the compliments I get about this unique product is just too enjoyable!any question regarding samsung mv800 is welcome~

Reviews.Title: This camera was an AMAZING buy!
Reviews.Author: Jesse Cabanes
Reviews.Content: Came as a bundle and I just cannot believe how fantastic this device is! All the shots are clear, no red-eye even when you don't apply it and the panoramic view is just incredible! It still shocks me that I got just a wonderful device and more for such a low cost. Definitely recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Flip Camera
Reviews.Author: Vnuci4o
Reviews.Content: This camera ended up being a lot more than I expected. There are a ton of features to play around with and I was impressed with the general picture quality. I am still learning about all the features it has. While on vacation in Greece, the battery power would average 1.5 days before needing recharged.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Petar
Reviews.Content: Small, easy to use, front LCD  display, 16MP, 12x zoom, WiFi...All in one! Me and my friends are really amazed.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: brittany pressey
Reviews.Content: came quickly with all the accessories. great sale on the items. perfect size for carrying around on trips. great quality pictures. the screen on the front is awesome for taking photos of the fiancé and I when we don't want to ask for someone to take a picture for us.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: gloria jenkins
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera!! Received it as a Christmas gift and was ready to use right out of the box. The pictures are amazing . So many options. And so easy to use!!

Reviews.Title: this camera is awesome
Reviews.Author: christian from trinidad
Reviews.Content: I just received my order I actually ordered it as a Christmas present for my mom along with  a laptop and wifi printer I can safely say this camera is excellent the pictures are clear the zoom. Is great and I cant wait to see my mom's expression when she opens her gifts on Christmas morning thank you amazon and thanks beach cameraYours trulyYour trini shopperChristian

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for a birthday gift.  The smart feature that allows wifi sharing with a iphone is awesome.  The zoom is not the greatest and the bag that comes with this bundle is way too big.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Tara "Tara"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. I love being able to send the pictures right to email or facebook. It has many good settings and features.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for great camera
Reviews.Author: lionheart
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my girlfriend and she loves it. She likes to take pictures of herself and friends and with the front lcd screen they can take that picture right. This bundle came with the carrying case, memory card and whatever else. Definately worth it and I couldn't be happier with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: OMG Love IT!
Reviews.Author: Brandi
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I needed a new camera, and I had seen many good reviews on it. I have to say, this is an amazing camera. I love the fact that you can do Picture-in-Picture, Funny faces (Which distort the person's face you are taking a picture of), and SEVERAL other features. It takes very good pictures too. I would reccommed this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Self portrait camera
Reviews.Author: Guido Guerriero
Reviews.Content: Very poor instruction manual.Very poor printing of manual.Not easy to useI would not recommend it to any one

Reviews.Title: Great Camera !!
Reviews.Author: Mikki R. "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: It's small and easy to use. It takes great pictures and it's very easy to learn how to use it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera!
Reviews.Author: Drmario515
Reviews.Content: First I got this primarily for use while on vacations / business travel. Often times I/we are forced to take self portrait style pics... The multiview capability is perfect for those instances. Its super convenient. Every girl that has seen or played with it seems to love it. So get this for your girlfriend or wife. Great picture resolution. The bundle I purchases is awesome!!! Love it! VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE!

Reviews.Title: small awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Gegechi
Reviews.Content: Samsung MV800 is a small awesome camera that is aroud 130 grams. I can take pictures from any angle easily, also self-portrait. The photo-editing application in this camera is unique, so I can enjoy my photo life.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth the money
Reviews.Author: Michelle Brown
Reviews.Content: We looked everywhere to find our teenage daughter a camera for her birthday. Amazon was the only place that had one in stock! It arrived in no time. The camera is really exactly what she wanted! Thank you, thank you, thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV150F is okay for a point and shot camera.
Reviews.Author: Jaime T. Kwan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera, because of the Dual-View screens.  The camera is okay, but not the greatest.1.  It is hard to see the image from the front screen during day light.2.  The "click" sound is hardly heard when the shutter activated.3.  No adjustment to add or minus light exposure.

Reviews.Title: Kid size...
Reviews.Author: Platinum Jones
Reviews.Content: Expected more in size... bought and gave to grandchild as a starter camera for his 10th birthday... ok for what was included... does everything shrink in size and increase in price?...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: andrew helton
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it has front LCD monitor for selfies and has wifi for easy posting online

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: mc
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! It takes the best pictures.. I love the accessories it came with.. The pictures are very clear and print great !!

Reviews.Title: It's excellent!
Reviews.Author: Alberto Pérez
Reviews.Content: I like it too much. It's a great product. I hope it works for many time Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: thank
Reviews.Author: miguel Rivera
Reviews.Content: this  camera  is  very  cool  my  wife  like  this  very  mush  is  was  a  good  price  good  delivery  everthing  was  very  good  thank  you  million  time

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: venitta
Reviews.Content: Ok but not any better than I had.  Thought it would be coller but doesn't sync very well.  Quite disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, very nice quality
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: Great camera, a lot of features but I would like that the main display would be touch screen and that the camera would have a bluetooth option.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice camera - BUT wrong size SD card in the bundle!
Reviews.Author: Cecilia B.
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera for our daughter as a Christmas gift... she loves it BUT when she opened her gift we found that the SD card included was a regular 8 GB SD card when the camera requires a Micro SD card!  And no card reader was included in the bundle either!  I am happy with the camera itself and all the features it provides, the bundle needs work though!

Reviews.Title: recommend 100% reliable
Reviews.Author: alirio javier hernandez
Reviews.Content: Yours faithfully. perfect product acceptance. 5 stars award you with responsible and safe, I will continue shopping with you in future

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Chaba
Reviews.Content: It was my first time when i bought something by internet.Now I am so happy!!Good service,good camera,fast shippping.!!))It will be a good surprise for my parents.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Abdul Ahad Khan
Reviews.Content: i love it, looking good, price is good, any body can buy this item, i suggest u can buy it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV150F Dual-View 16.2 MP Smart Cam...
Reviews.Author: Joy G.
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Meets and surpasses all my expectations. Love that it has WiFi, so easy to post pictures to Facebook which I love!

Reviews.Title: Samsung camera
Reviews.Author: Nita J. Inman
Reviews.Content: This a really nice camera but at my age I have problems with the small viewing lens that all the cameras are using now.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera!
Reviews.Author: Creator of Mail
Reviews.Content: I use this thing all the time and it is always great. The lcd flip screen is what makes the product for me. Being able to flip it up and get lower perspective shots without actually having to get down low is much easier on my back and knees than traditional camera setups and all the menu picture options are fun to experiment with. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking to have fun and take good shots without investing in a more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: The best camera ever easy to use and I love the extra features it has compared to an older model use to own. Love the special features to email and send pictures instantly.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Dario campos
Reviews.Content: The product is in good conditions and is very easy for use. thanks for all. i wait buy others products

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Charity File "Luvinit219"
Reviews.Content: Fun little camera.  Pretty easy to figure out.  Picture quality not "greatest" but good enough for a 12 year old who loves to take pictures of herself.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual view........
Reviews.Author: nicelilfox "Sandra"
Reviews.Content: I love the compact and simplicity of this camera. you can actually see the front of the pic your gonna take. It's pretty kewl. The company to buy from was great.  Shipped and received without any problems. Would for sure recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: fabuloso
Reviews.Author: alejandro
Reviews.Content: que maravilla este producto mil gracias los recomiendo ademas que sus garantías se extienden a latino américa en marcas reconocidas como samsung mil gracias excelente

Reviews.Title: Versatile camera.
Reviews.Author: Ramon
Reviews.Content: Camara versatile and easy to use with high quality images and additional articles that improve the price value of what you are buying!

Reviews.Title: Great setup
Reviews.Author: Randy L. Moulton "Randy"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter and she love it. She is always taking squeeze pictures and the dual view function is great for that. Also you get all the other stuff to go with the camera which is very handy.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: media
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use. Great picture quality for the money. It has so many apps, and WIFI. what more do you want for this kind of price. The pics come out so clear even at night.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my son
Reviews.Author: C. Hepler "L.Hepler"
Reviews.Content: He wanted a point and shoot camera that will fit in his pocket.He loves the camera and all of the features it has.

Reviews.Title: Awesome purchase
Reviews.Author: Naomi
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in pretty decent time. It works very well even though I read reviews that complained about slow shutter speed. The tripod is extremely small (which I thought it would be) but I could see how people would get confused about it being a little bigger. The screen on the front is pretty awesome and definitely handy if you are taking the picture with yourself in it. This is definitely a good purchase! My only complaint is that I still can't figure out how to send pictures from it to a smart phone which I read it was supposed to do that.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Radiancegrace "radiancegrace"
Reviews.Content: Has done all it said it could do and the price is unbelievable for everything you receive in this package.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: East Tn Girl
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos. It is small & lightweight and very portable. I'm very happy with it so far

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera With Great Bundle Kit!
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Got the camera and kit in very fast. I have never owned a Samsung camera before, but glad i got this one. It is very fast and takes excellent photos, even at 5 times zoom. The kit came with a tiny tripod that gets the job done well, and a cleaning kit which is nice, a very nice camera holder and a micro sd card with card reader. For the price it comes with a lot of great accessories and a wonderful smart camera.

Reviews.Title: all in order
Reviews.Author: Jhon Hernandez-LEC-005250
Reviews.Content: I agree with the article but not fully what goes on image.appreciate your service. I hope to make another purchase with you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dotch_3
Reviews.Content: This is a very good item and the description of the one  was correct and the item is working as expected.This customer is trust.Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: JUST AS ADVERTISED
Reviews.Author: vincent j mays
Reviews.Content: THIS LITLE CAMERA WAS BETTER THAN ADVERTISED. IT HAD MORE FEATURES THAN EXPECTED. IT WILL TAKE SOME TIME TO FIGURE HOW TO USE EVERYTHING. THE PRICE COULD NOT HAVE BEEN BETTER. SAW ADVERTISEMENTS FOR MUCH MORE MONEY WITH NO ACCESSORIES.

Reviews.Title: Samsung MV800
Reviews.Author: Luis Pérez
Reviews.Content: Excelente la adquisición que hice a traves de este medio, me llego tal cual la solicité, a buen precio y en optimas condiciones, en el tiempo requerido

Reviews.Title: cool little camera
Reviews.Author: terry l kennedy
Reviews.Content: My wife has been looking for a camera that would had features that matched her desires and the Samsung DV300F came through in spades. She wanted to be able to take quick photos of her with our grandchildren without the guess work of getting all in the picture plus doing so before the little ones skedaddle and the dual view lets her do that, additionally the kids get a kick making faces on the front of the camera. Being able to email photos via WiFi directly from the camera is a very cool feature as well. She really likes the cute size and the images have turned out really well. The additional items such as camera bag, memory card, tripod & cleaning kit makes it a great choice for her & myself. a cool little camera.

Reviews.Title: MV800
Reviews.Author: diego
Reviews.Content: This camera is really good, the picture quality is great, it takes very little time to turn on so it's always ready when you want to take a picture of one of those once-in-a-lifetime moments.The menu is kindda old looking but it has all the options you would expect from a digital camera.The flexible screen is exactly why I bought it. This was a birthday gift for my wife and she loves to take pictures of us toghether when we go out. With this we dont have to ask the waitress to take a picture of us at every restaurant.

Reviews.Title: Greattttttttttttttttttttt
Reviews.Author: Ladybird
Reviews.Content: One of the most great digital cameras that i ever had . u have all options u need the colors are wonderful also.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Viviane
Reviews.Content: I loved my camera!!!!!!! There is not problem if you are alone and want to take pictures! You can take by yourself! It's very good!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with it.
Reviews.Author: hermelinda
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera and everything that came with it but, the case, it is way too big for it though it is a very nice one, I am actually pleased with the product. Thank you, specially because I received it right on time.

Reviews.Title: Camera fine but kit was incomplete
Reviews.Author: June DeFore
Reviews.Content: Camera itself is fine, but all items advertised were not received.  The wrong size SD card was included and the card reader was not included.

Reviews.Title: Daughter's Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Mindy Kotaska
Reviews.Content: I used this for 2 weeks before I gave it to my daughter.  The younger kids absolutely love the front screen and the image that appears in the child shoot mode works great to keep attention.  The Android app works great as well with this.  The case that comes in the kit is a too small to keep everything together and the cleaning solution leaked all over in the box but was contained in a plastic wrapper so I just threw the bottle out and kept the cleaning cloth.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great, the bundle is not so great
Reviews.Author: Mags
Reviews.Content: 1. The bundle came with an SD card and not a micro SD card.2. A card reader was not included.3. The case was not good quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent bundle, but...
Reviews.Author: Gus
Reviews.Content: Excellent bundle, but I didn't receive the card reader they must check the description if the card reader is not included.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Khan
Reviews.Content: Received the order in time for xmas. Very good camera for the price.  Pictures come out very clear. I like the front view.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: rafael cordero
Reviews.Content: El producto vino tal cual lo especificÃ³ el vendedor con todos sus accesorios  y funciona a la perfecciÃ³n... cÃ¡mara muy cÃ³moda y fÃ¡cil de manejar.

Reviews.Title: Estupenda Camara
Reviews.Author: alice
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, me encanto mucho. Puedo recomendarla ampliamente.  Es una estupenda camara y el combo que incluye tambien es fabuloso.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: yolie
Reviews.Content: we bought this camera for our daugther for christmas she loves it it's easy to use and comes with so many extras she is pleased with it and we would recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't buy it this way twice.
Reviews.Author: RON
Reviews.Content: This is a decent little outfit but if I had it to do over again, I would have bought the camera separately from the memory card. I had a customer service issue with Beach Camera that did not go well at first but then eventually someone at Beach applied some common sense and made the issue right. Because of that, I went from originally wanting to give Beach 1 star to giving them 4 stars. If the customer service issue had gone like it should from the get-go, I would have given them 5 stars. Be warned and be careful buying something that states, "Fulfilled by Amazon" and then finding  out that the dealer used by Amazon to fill this order may or may not deal with customer service issues. They just may want only their money and if there's any problems, too bad if it's hard to resolve. Look at all the different dealers offers, find out if your buying directly from Beach Camera or any other dealer, or not, then be careful buying something that says, "Fulfilled by Amazon."

Reviews.Title: Very Bad Experience
Reviews.Author: Anil
Reviews.Content: I have ordered the red colored item and saved my cart and ordered on other day, when it delivered i got Black one.Very late delivery, wrong memory card which does not work, no card reader shipped with this order, lot of things with one order itself.Very disappointed after i opened up the box. My wife found the same product in Fry's in local news paper for $89/ only and wondered why we spend $130 for this + hassle of shipping back. I would not recommend this at all.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F Dual-View 16.2 MP Smart Camera with Built-in Wi-Fi - Black Deluxe Bundle With 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit.
